minCost.description: Min cost of ticket. Seems to be Amadeus only.

maxCost.description: Max cost of ticket. Seems to be Amadeus only.

guestClientId.description: Passenger id from Cruise Res system

items.description: Not an enum as list can change at anytime.

seqNum.description: Sequence number of port in the sequence of ports. Starting at 0

reservationType.description: Type of air reservation, BUNDLED or STANDARD

status.description: Status of cruise reservation. OF, BK, CX, etc

id.description: ID of agency booking was created under

airItinMode.description: Only Amadeus seems to have this

version.description: Current know version of the air booking by the messages producers. Consumer should ignore inbound messages if less than their current known version.
Current know version of the reservation by the messages producers. Consumer should ignore inbound messages if less than their current known version

resultId.description: Identifier from the flight search. This is unique to a search and must be used when selecting a flight

selectedOption.description: specific flight identifier from search result. Must be a result from the matching resultId

stopover.description: number of stopovers in a journey

itineraryType.description: options: OW = One way and RT = Round Trip

refundableStr.description: used for backwards compatibility with AMC

hostPTC.description: Not an enum as this is defined by GDS

pricingPTC.description: Not an enum as list can change at anytime.

flightDirection.description: OUTBOUND is flying out to cruise port. RETURN is returning home

codeShare.description: Airline sharing the profit on the ticket

segmentSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the segment

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found
